attributes.action: give the police the power to apply to a magistrate immediately to suspend a driver’s licence when a death or an accident where other members of the public have been injured has occurred and when there is objective proof of an offence such as drunk/driving or speeding, while evidence is being gathered for the criminal prosecution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please support this petition for a change in the law to allow the police to suspend the licence and hold it when there is objective proof that a road crime has been committed, such as drink/driving, drug/driving or speeding, in order to deprive drivers of the possibility of re-offending while waiting for the case to come to court, and to emphasise the need for responsible driving to prevent further deaths.
